parameters.name: DedicatedHostIds
parameters.description: The region ID of the dedicated host. You can call the [DescribeRegions](~~25609~~) operation to query the most recent region list.

parameters.name: Period
parameters.description:
The unit of the renewal period. Valid values:

*   Month
*   Year

Default value: Month.

parameters.name: PeriodUnit
parameters.description: The client token that is used to ensure the idempotence of the request. You can use the client to generate a client token. Make sure that a unique client token is used for each request. The token can contain only ASCII characters and cannot exceed 64 characters in length. For more information, see [How to ensure idempotence?](~~25693~~)

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description:
The renewal duration. Valid values:

*   Valid values when the PeriodUnit parameter is set to Month: 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 9, 12, 24, 36, 48, and 60.
*   Valid values when the PeriodUnit parameter is set to Year: 1, 2, 3, 4, and 5.
